theme.title1:
About XOOPSCube

XOOPSCube Legacy was a pioneer open source project in providing developing, deploying and supporting complex IT solutions. Touching millions of lives world wide by bringing in innovative technology.
theme.title2: XOOPSCube forayed into the sectors like e-Governance, research and education, in Japan, China, USA and Europe.
